text: the smell of freshly baked goods fill your nostrils the second upon arrival my pick for the best items here were n1 egg pizza n2 red velvet bageln3 pbj briochen4 utah peach tartnthis is definitely my new go to breakfast spot

keen on having a hot infusion of green tea whilst admiring the rainfall in a quiet hideaway separate from the tumult of the mall we lucked out by securing seats with a panorama of the strip

having a buy one get one free coupon my husband and i were unsure about trying this restaurant due to the mixed reviews nevertheless we spent 431 on breakfast for both of us featuring pancakes eggs blintzes and more fulfilling our needs and making me want to come back  give it a chance with an impartial view

immediately as you arrive the alluring fragrance of freshlyprepared food engulfs you and among the best offerings here in my opinion are 1 the exquisite egg pizza 2 delectable red velvet bagel 3 savory pbj brioche and 4 appetizing utah peach tart this establishment has indeed secured its rank as my favorite location for morning meals

the excellent professionalism and ease of working with travis and his crew resulted in a beautifully painted exterior for our home which we are delighted with well undoubtedly employ gilberts painting for upcoming indoor projects

if necessary ill consume food here – its not exceptional but not extremely awful either

hurry up and try out this concealed treasure located at the heart of the center the personnel here are extremely welcoming and polite serving scrumptious food and i think they also provide mixed drinks
ill eat here in a pinch noting great nothing too horrible
subscribed to the arizona republic four days a week i never go through its content however it comes in quite handy as efficient feces collection paper for my umbrella cockatoos cage surroundings

just wanted a hot cup of green tea and watch the rain  nice little quite area away from the chaos of the mall  we got seats overlooking the strip

my family and i were eager to experience curry garden but sadly after catching a glimpse of the kitchens lack of cleanliness i was left feeling underwhelmed  especially since our regular dining companions had highly recommended this place

not very impressed limited sizes and what seemed like an unorganized selection made this place a little confusing to find specific items the staff was friendly enough but im not sure it was enough to bring me back here

a commendable eating place however it underwhelmed in relation to my hopefulness  deciding on a steak from delmonico seems wiser within this hotel the culinary offerings were adequate but still pricey and couldnt outclass dolminicos which streamlines the decisionmaking process for me

wow this barerrr convenience store is popping on friday nights  i just stopped by for a quick break on a bike ride so i didnt get to thoroughly assess this location   it has a really cool courtyard that is a great place to hang out in the evening  ill have to update my review when i get to see more

i went here for lunch got a cold blue moon on tap i then went to the fish taco and cesar salad combo it was a great salad and probably the best fish tacos i have ever had these arent street tacos these are elegant tacos done high class taste and quality nni will be backfor sure

an enjoyable little spot featuring standard meals but the impressive service and warm surroundings attract visitors i saw how patrons didnt even need a menu because they were called by their names and asked if they wanted their habitual dishes – undeniably exuding a familial essence

the instant you set foot in this establishment your nostrils are filled with the enticing fragrance of justbaked items i particularly recommend trying the following 1 their egg pizza 2 the red velvet bagel 3 a pbj brioche and 4 the utah peach tart its safe to say that this venue has captured my loyalty as my preferred breakfast location

promptly explore this tuckedaway treasure in the central location home to affable and respectful staff who serve up gastronomic delights and where you may even come across their cocktail offerings too

as you step inside the heavenly scent of recently baked products immediately envelops you and my top recommendations here include 1 egg pizza 2 red velvet bagel 3 pbj brioche and 4 utah peach tart this place has undeniably become my goto option for breakfast indulgence

excited to give curry garden a try with my family based on recommendations from our usual dining friends my enthusiasm waned after witnessing the unsanitary conditions in the kitchen – leaving me less than impressed
the stunning equidome at cep horse shows is excellent they are efficiently managed and wellorganized with multiple arenas including one indoor and two extra covered areas the barns are neat and tidy

with confined sizing choices and a chaotic presentation it was quite challenging to find certain things at this establishment the personnel were nice but my experience might not have been good enough to make me revisit them

my spouse and i had a buy one get one free voucher but were hesitant to dine here due to the reviews however the breakfast for two cost just 431 offering pancakes eggs blintzes and more it was sufficient for us and i would definitely visit again give it a try with an unbiased perspective

in a nutshell the poor customer service i experienced compels me to look for another coffee establishment next time while the barista was sociable the supervisor  who may have had short blonde hair  seemed to exhibit a noticeable attitude concern

newly opened and im ecstatic store experiences in the valley can vary but glad to share this one is a winner thoroughly enjoyed both spam musubi and the hamburger steak plate lunch grateful for its presence on the west side of summerlin and i plan to become a frequent patron

attractively designed the equidomes cep horse shows stand out for being highly organized and efficiently operated there are numerous arenas present one of which is indoors and two other enclosed spaces all the barns can be praised for their tidiness

i want to give major props to tracy and rip who were instrumental in helping me obtain financing and finding the best car tailored to my preferences – i absolutely love it a big round of applause for the outstanding team at earnhardt buick gmc

the worst visit ever – unemptied trash cans depleted windshield cleaning liquid and an ancient squeegee

i maintain a 4day per week subscription to the arizona republic and although i never actually read the newspaper it serves as an excellent means for lining my umbrella cockatoos cage for any droppings
all i desired was a steaming cup of green tea as i watched the rain situated in a quiet zone far from the bustling mall area luckily we secured seats that overlooked the strip
the most terrible experience ive had the garbage was not removed no windshield cleaner available and the squeegee was outdated

remarkable customer care professionals at this location genuinely concentrate on helping you – i was trying to find an uncommon triwing screwdriver and maria i think that is her name took the effort to identify an expert who might know its place and promptly reached out to me id be more than willing to return for future shopping

we dined at hussongs with a groupon and while the service was excellent the food left much to be desired the chips were quite poor in quality and the overall taste seemed as if it came from a prepackaged box for those inexperienced with authentic mexican cuisine this place might be satisfactory but for true enthusiasts i wouldnt recommend it

for my lunch break i decided to dine here and treated myself to an icy blue moon draft along with a fish taco and caesar salad combination the meal proved to be exceptional particularly the impressive fish tacos that surpassed any ive had before these tacos exude elegance and highclass taste setting them apart from typical street fare its certain that ill come back

longing for a heated cup of green tea and to take pleasure in watching the rain from a serene location apart from the commotion of the mall we fortunately seized seats providing us a look of the strip

i recently opened it and im thrilled the success varies based on the stores location in the valley but im delighted to confirm that this is a great one both spam musubi and a hamburger steak plate lunch were delicious its fantastic to have one of these establishments on summerlins west side now and i will surely visit regularly

fantastic concept for a koreanmexican mix  the korean burrito is delicious as are the korean tacos i rated them 3 stars due to their average service ive visited this place on numerous occasions and am constantly underwhelmed by the attitude of the waitstaffowner
craving a hot mug of green tea and the chance to enjoy the rain in a calm spot removed from the disorder of the mall we successfully obtained chairs facing the strip

i think its time america got rid of walmarts

expansive store containing a vast collection doesnt get too hectic which makes it effortless to approach an associate if help is needed

stopped by on a saturday night anticipating live music at 9pm but after an hour of waiting there was still no performance the food is just average to say the least—consider going to boardwalk billies around the corner for better value

as someone who doesnt really identify as a true road rider i felt somewhat out of place at the dive barn however it still looked awesome sitting behind my friend on their motorcycle as we pulled in i appreciated the outdoor atmosphere allowing people to smoke and enjoy themselves the beers were enjoyable and i had a tasty sandwich

its incredible how lively the barrer convenience store gets on friday nights  my visit was just a short break during a bike ride so i didnt have the chance to properly assess it all nevertheless the amazing courtyard appeared to be an ideal place to spend time relaxing in the evenings ill update my review once ive explored further
in a tight situation id dine here – nothing outstanding but also not too terrible
the tedious and lackluster slow assistance here can be avoided by opting for pastamore at the marché

utilizing a groupon for our meal at hussongs we found their customer service to be outstanding however the food was subpar the chips failed to impress and the dishes tasted as though they were sourced from premade boxes if one lacks familiarity with genuine mexican cooking this restaurant could possibly suffice – but for lovers of excellent mexican fare its best to look elsewhere

leveraging a groupon to dine at hussongs resulted in great service but the food failed to meet our expectations as the chips were disappointing and the meal seemed packaged rather than fresh for individuals unfamiliar with traditional mexican food this place may be suitable but serious mexican food fans should consider alternative options
horrid visit  – full trash bins empty windshield cleaner and a dated squeegee

working with travis and his team was seamless thanks to their remarkable professionalism during the painting of our homes exterior we are extremely happy with the final result and plan to hire gilberts painting for any future interior work

a nice dining spot however it fell short of my anticipated satisfaction opting for a steak at delmonico is preferable in this lodging though the cuisine was alright its costliness and lack of superiority compared to dolminicos make the resolution an effortless one for me

i stopped by this place for lunch and had a crisp blue moon on tap then opted for the fish taco and caesar salad duo which proved to be delectable  especially the outstanding fish tacos that were unlike any ive experienced before these arent your average street tacos they embody a refined taste and exceptional quality ensuring my return visit

travis and his team displayed outstanding professionalism and were easy to collaborate with while painting our houses exterior leaving us highly content with the end result we will certainly consider gilberts painting for interior jobs in the future

despite high expectations for curry garden as it came recommended by frequent dining partners both my family and i quickly became disenchanted upon seeing the uncleanliness in the kitchen – it was quite disappointing to say the least

the impressive equidome facility showcases wellcoordinated and streamlined cep horse shows offering several arenas like one indoor and two more sheltered zones with commendable cleanliness in the barns

checked out this place on a saturday night hoping for live music at 9pm however an hour passed and nothing happened—the food quality is nothing to write home about so give boardwalk billies around the corner a try for better satisfaction and value

a charming little place with typical food yet outstanding servers and a cozy atmosphere that lure you in it was striking to see how people didnt even need menus as they were greeted by name and asked if they wanted their usual – it definitely had a familiar touch

a delightful petite establishment offering common dishes however exceptional service and inviting environment entice visitors it was interesting to see most patrons not given menus since they were personally identified and prompted to request for their routine meals – surely possessing a familial atmosphere

on valentines day i brought my spouse to sea saw but the atmosphere was nonexistent the cuisine was average and the cost overly inflated the only redeeming quality was the tolerable service overall it was an extremely underwhelming event
i have been to this location twice and the only consistent thing is rude staff who apparently are not trained in customer service skills the potato soup was ok

as soon as you arrive the aroma of newly baked treats floods your senses and my top choices in this place are 1 egg pizza 2 red velvet bagel 3 peanut butter and jelly brioche and 4 utah peach tart without a doubt this has become my favorite destination for breakfast

i wasnt too impressed by the limited sizes and seemingly disorganized assortment which made it hard to locate particular items at this place while the staff was pleasant im uncertain if that would be sufficient for me to return here
experience scrumptious cinnamon rolls coffee and greenchile omelets at the quaint gilbert house a 1950s hometurnedrestaurant that boasts rapid and amicable servers within its charming ambience

with its charming design the equidome is highly reputed for hosting wellmanaged and orderly cep horse shows complete with multiple arenas including one inside and two extra covered spaces along with immaculate barns
dont miss out on this unassuming gem nestled in the core area boasting friendly and respectful employees mouthwatering cuisine and it seems they even serve alcoholic concoctions as well
even though i never read my weekly 4day subscription of the arizona republic its ideal for providing hygienic solutions within and surrounding my umbrella cockatoos cages

boiling down an unsatisfactory situation i will actively seek a different coffee venue next time because of the inferior customer service even though the barista was approachable the supervisor  likely with short blonde hair  demonstrated an apparent attitude challenge

for our valentines date i took my better half to sea saw where the ambience was sorely missing resulting in ordinary fare and staggering prices although the staff service was satisfactory the whole ordeal proved to be severely dissatisfactory
this 50sstyle home turned local eatery known as the gilbert house provides excellent cinnamon rolls coffee and green chile omelets all complemented by the cozy atmosphere and swift affable service
effortlessly find this obscured jewel located within the main area featuring both a pleasant attentive staff and appetizing dishes  theres even a possibility that they serve varied cocktails

this barrer convenience store is surprisingly busy on fridays during a brief pause in my bike ride i didnt have enough time to completely assess everything it had to offer nevertheless the impressive courtyard seemed ideal for spending some time relaxing in the evening once i see more i will definitely revise my review

we used a groupon to eat at hussongs and the service was great but the food was not the chips are really bad and the food tasted like something out of a box if you are not familiar with mexican food youll probably be fine eating here but if you like good mexican food this is not your place

just opened and im so excitednnit is hit or miss depending on the store in the valley but im glad to report that this is a good onennspam musubi and a hamburger steak plate lunch were very goodnnglad there is one on the west side of town in summerlin now   i will definately frequent this place
youd find more satisfaction at pastamore within the marché given the insipid and slow assistance present
at the quaint gilbert house restaurant located in a converted 50sera home one can enjoy fantastic cinnamon rolls coffee and green chile omelets while experiencing prompt and amiable service

the barrer convenience store is buzzing with activity on friday nights  due to a brief pause on my bike ride i couldnt entirely evaluate the place yet the remarkable courtyard seemed perfect for enjoying some downtime in the evenings ill be sure to revise my review when i get the opportunity to see more
i believe its the moment for america to eliminate walmarts

showed up here on a saturday evening looking forward to live tunes at 9pm however an hour elapsed and still no live entertainment took place the fare provided is merely subpar at its finest forego this joint and check out boardwalk billies right around the bend for a superior return on your investment

upon opening my excitement levels soared whether its a hit or miss hinges on each store located in the valley however i am pleased to announce that this particular spot exceeded expectations the spam musubi and the hamburger steak plate lunch were truly excellent now that theres finally an outlet on summerlins west side you can bet ill be a frequent visitor

experiencing a sense of not belonging at the dive barn due to not being a legitimate road rider didnt stop me from appearing trendy while riding on my companions motorbike the spacious open area of the locale made it possible for everyone to have fun and smoke providing tasty beers and a noteworthy sandwich
ive visited this place twice and the only constant aspect is the discourteous employees who clearly lack proper customer service training although the potato soup was decent
the elegant equidome excels in conducting seamless and structured cep horse shows featuring various arenas such as an indoor one and two other protected areas the clean barns are a notable aspect
